channel.title: Exploring the Dataset in Tableau on Dremio Modernization Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Exploring the Dataset in Tableau on Dremio Modernization Workshop

item.title: Reviewing count of records by Date
item.description: Navigate back to your Tableau Online Workbook which should still show the count of NYC_Taxi records. Count the records by pickup date by dragging the pickup_date dimension to the column bar. Tableau is now showing the count of records for each year in the dataset. Let’s get a little more granular with the data by examining the data by month. Hover over the blue YEAR(pickup_date) and click the dropdown arrow.

item.title: How Does Month Impact Surcharge
item.description: Clear your Tableau sheet by pressing the button on the Tableau toolbar and selecting “Clear Sheet” . Now you are going to examine how each month of the year impacts the surcharge of a taxi ride. To do this first you are going to drag “Pickup_Date” to the columns bar and select Month from the drop down. **Remember we are looking for the sum for each month not a month over month comparison** Now drag the surcharge measure to the rows bar.

item.title: Reviewing the Jobs in Dremio
item.description: Navigate back to your Dremio UI and click on the jobs tab. Everytime you change a parameter or add a field to your Tableau analysis, Tableau passes back a SQL query for Dremio to perform. You can see all of the jobs that have run in Dremio. Notice the duration is
